name: 阿列克塞·古斯科夫 Aleksei Guskov
intro: People's artist of the Russian Federation State Prize Laureate of the Russian Federation * Graduated from Moscow Art Theater studio school in 1983 * Played in more than 40 films. Over 30 performed roles in theater * Producer of feature, television, and animated films * General producer of ZAO "STUDIO "F.A.F."
